analyze.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to examine or think about something carefully in order to see what it is like or to understand it
analyze.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The data is collected and then analyzed on computer.
analyze.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to separate and examine different types of costs, sales figures etc in order to understand them or take decisions based on them
analyze.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Cost control has been tightened, with costs being analysed even down to the 100-yen level.
